lead_paragraph: NAHMIAS--Jack. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Jack Nahmias, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Jack's beloved daughters, Eileen Bloom (Jay) and Shari Leff; his grandchildren, Jordan, Jennifer, Justin, and Julie; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
